mapper.select: SELECT s.comp_scrap_id, s.resume_id, u.name, u.birth, r.title, r.career, r.education, u.address FROM COMP_SCRAP_TB s join resume_tb r on s.resume_id = r.resume_id join user_tb u on u.user_id = r.user_id where s.comp_id = #{compId}

SELECT us.user_scrap_id, j.jobs_id, j.position, j.career, j.title, c.comp_name, j.end_date FROM user_scrap_tb us JOIN jobs_tb j ON us.jobs_id = j.jobs_id join comp_tb c on c.comp_id = j.comp_id WHERE us.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_scrap_tb (user_id, jobs_id, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{sDto.jobsId}, now())
INSERT INTO comp_scrap_tb (comp_id, resume_id, created_at) VALUES (#{compId}, #{sDto.resumeId}, now())
